channel.title: Hi, I'm Elliott Bennett from Logic Media
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm Elliott. I have some specific questions about a new project, but I'll keep this just for the introduction.
My wife and I run [Logic Media][1], a website design and development shop in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. I've been doing this for some 11 years, and it's going pretty good.
But there's always been the itch to do something a bit more scaleable than selling hours. We had the idea about two years ago to create a flash sale e-commerce site, and recently launched [Ashford Fair][2]. This one isn't doing so good, but that's a topic for a different post.
Anyway, I'm glad this community exists! It's already been a very helpful resource.
-Elliott
[1]: http://www.logicmediazone.com [2]: http://www.ashfordfair.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Elliott Bennett from Logic Media
item.dc:creator: LogicMedia
item.description:
Hey everyone, I’m Elliott. I have some specific questions about a new project, but I’ll keep this just for the introduction.

My wife and I run Logic Media, a website design and development shop in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. I’ve been doing this for some 11 years, and it’s going pretty good.

But there’s always been the itch to do something a bit more scaleable than selling hours. We had the idea about two years ago to create a flash sale e-commerce site, and recently launched Ashford Fair. This one isn’t doing so good, but that’s a topic for a different post.

Anyway, I’m glad this community exists! It’s already been a very helpful resource.

-Elliott
